RateCardEntry.name: RateCardEntry
RateCardEntry.description: Represents a rule that determines the charge rate for using a product's resource. Each entry is linked to one rate card exclusively, and its activation or deactivation can be controlled by assigning effective dates.

DefaultUnitOfMeasureClassId.description: ID of the default unit of measure classification record associated with this rate card entry.

DefaultUnitOfMeasureId.description: ID of the default unit of measure record associated with this rate card entry.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date and time when the rate card entry comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: Date and time until when the rate card entry remains effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Auto-generated identifier for the rate card entry record.

ProductId.description: ID of the product whose resource is being used as a rate card entry.

ProductSellingModelId.description: ID of the product selling model associated with this rate card entry.

Rate.description: Value of the rate card entry.

RateCardId.description: ID of the rate card associated with this rate card entry.

RateCardType.description: Type of rate card associated with this rate card entry.

RateNegotiation.description: Type of rate negotiation applicable to the rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureClassId.description: ID of the unit of measure classification record associated with this rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureId.description: ID of the standard unit of measure record associated with this rate card entry.

RateUnitOfMeasureName.description: Name of the standard unit of measure record of the associated rate card entry.

Status.description: Status of the rate card entry.

UsageProductId.description: ID of the product associated with the resource for which the rate is specified.

UsageResourceId.description: ID of the resource associated with this rate card entry.
